title: ESET SMART SECURITY 8 [Hyperdrive25]
description:
ESET SMART SECURITY Version: 8.0.312.0
                ====================================== 
ESET Smart Security gives you the peace of mind to enjoy your digital journey, secured by multi-layered Internet security. Rely on anti-malware solution with Antivirus, Anti-Theft and now with Botnet Protection.

Antivirus and Anti-Phishing
---------------------------
Shopping online or checking the latest news? Securely browse the Internet with Antivirus. Avoid fake sites with Anti-Phishing.

Anti-Theft
----------
Ever worried your laptop might be missing? Track and locate your missing laptop or contact the finder thanks to Anti-Theft.

Personal Firewall
-----------------
Are you connecting via public Wi-Fi hotspots? Our Personal Firewall will protect your personal data as you connect wherever you are.

Complete List Of Features
-------------------------
Antivirus, Antispyware, Anti-Theft, Anti-Phishing, Personal Firewall, Antispam, Parental Control,Social Media Scanner, Exploit Blocker, Advanced Memory Scanner, Vulnerability Shield, Botnet Protection.

How To Lifetime Activate Eset[OFFLINE METHOD]:
=============================================
This part is only for Eset Purefix Users
----------------------------------------
If you have been already using Eset Purefix crack have an old version of Eset running on your PC, you need to run the purefix again(SAFE MODE) to disable it, that is, you can use eset_fix.exe to uninstall the fix, reboot it NORMAL mode and then uninstall your old Eset Anitvirus.

When your old antivirus has been completely uninstalled, install the new Eset, either 32bit or 64bit depending on what version of windows you are running. If you don't know, you can click on system information located under administrative tools in the control panel. Or you can right-click My Computer and then click on properties. When you have determined your OS, install that particular Eset package.

After you install Eset, disable it, and extract the contents of Crack.exe to a folder of your choice and reboot in SAFE MODE. In SAFE MODE, locate the folder where you extracted the crack, use eset_fix.exe to apply the patch. Reboot normally and update your virus definition files if you have internet. If you don't have internet, don't worry, as the default definitions files are already there.

[ONLINE METHOD]
===============
Go into the TNOD Folder, and extract the contents if the installer and run it.
The application will find the key and install it for you. The process is automatic.

When the key expires eventually, TNOD will find and install another one automatically. You can also hunt for keys manually using the TNOD interface[optional].

N.B: You cannot use both the purefix and tnod at the same time.
ENJOY!
